bug.summary: Possible segfault in invalid local calls
bug.text: Passing an invalid sequence or array of unsigned longs in a local call could lead to a segfault in the Python interpreter.

If you have patched omniORB 3.0.0 to fix bug 5, you will see undefined symbols for things to do with tracedmutex or tracedcondition when you try to import the omniORBpy modules. To fix this, make a clean build of omniORBpy, with "make clean; make export".

bug.summary: omniidl name look-up is more strict
bug.text: When looking-up a name, omniidl now raises an error if a name which differs only in case is found along the look-up path. Before, it would ignore the name and continue until an exact match was found.
